keyMoments.title: Usopp Searches for the Going Merry
keyMoments.description: Disguised as a marine chore boy, Usopp infiltrates the G-8 docks to locate the Going Merry.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Usopp's dedication to recovering the crew's ship despite the dangerous situation.
keyMoments.quote: Now where did they put the Merry? I've got to find it before anyone notices me.

keyMoments.title: Usopp Impersonates Inspector Shepherd
keyMoments.description: When cornered by Drake, Usopp improvises by claiming to be Captain Usopp, the Special Inspector from Marine Headquarters.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Usopp's quick thinking and creativity in desperate situations.
keyMoments.quote: You're mistaken! I am Captain Usopp, Special Inspector from Marine Headquarters!

keyMoments.title: Usopp Captured and Imprisoned
keyMoments.description: Exposed by Robin's arrival as the 'real' Inspector Shepherd, Usopp is captured and thrown in the brig with Zoro, becoming the second Straw Hat to be imprisoned.
keyMoments.significance: Increases the stakes for the crew's escape and sets up the Condoriano joke in the next episode.
keyMoments.quote: Robin sold me out! She pretended to be the inspector I was impersonating!

keyMoments.title: Robin Defeats Officer and Takes Disguise
keyMoments.description: Robin defeats a marine officer using her Hana Hana no Mi powers and assumes his identity as Major Shepherd, a visiting inspector from Marine Headquarters.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Robin's tactical approach to infiltration and her effective use of devil fruit abilities for stealth.

keyMoments.title: Robin Exposes Usopp's Deception
keyMoments.description: Robin arrives at Jonathan's office claiming to be the real Major Shepherd, completely exposing Usopp's impostor act and leading to his capture.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Robin's willingness to sacrifice a crewmate's freedom temporarily to maintain her own cover for intelligence gathering.
keyMoments.quote: I apologize for my delay, Vice Admiral. I am Major Shepherd from Marine Headquarters.

keyMoments.title: Zoro Gains Cell Mate
keyMoments.description: Usopp is thrown into Zoro's cell after being captured, making them both prisoners of the G-8 marines.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up their joint escape attempt and the famous Condoriano scene in the next episode.
keyMoments.quote: Usopp! What are you doing here? Did you get caught too?

keyMoments.title: Luffy's Cover Blown in Kitchen
keyMoments.description: Luffy and Sanji's disguise as the Marley Brothers is discovered by Jonathan, forcing them to flee the kitchen.
keyMoments.significance: Eliminates another cover identity and increases pressure on the remaining free crew members.

keyMoments.title: Sanji's Cover Blown in Kitchen
keyMoments.description: Sanji's disguise as one of the Marley Brothers is discovered by Jonathan alongside Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Forces Sanji to abandon his position in the kitchen and flee.

keyMoments.title: Jonathan Meets 'Inspector Shepherd'
keyMoments.description: Jonathan welcomes who he believes is Inspector Shepherd from Marine Headquarters, though it's actually Usopp in disguise.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Jonathan's tactical mind as he carefully observes the situation.
keyMoments.quote: Welcome, Inspector Shepherd. We've been expecting you from headquarters.

keyMoments.title: Jonathan Discovers Luffy and Sanji
keyMoments.description: Jonathan uncovers the true identities of the Marley Brothers as Straw Hat Luffy and Sanji.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Jonathan's investigative skills and attention to detail.
keyMoments.quote: So you're not the Marley Brothers after all. Straw Hat Luffy, I presume?

keyMoments.title: Jonathan's Strategic Planning
keyMoments.description: Jonathan analyzes the situation and plans his moves to systematically capture all the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Jonathan's chess-like approach to warfare and tactical superiority.
keyMoments.quote: The Straw Hats are scattered throughout the base. Now we just need to close the net carefully, piece by piece.

relationships.description: Jonathan is married to Jessica, the head chef at G-8.

keyMoments.title: Drake Questions Usopp
keyMoments.description: Drake arrives at the docks and through clever interrogation, exposes Usopp's deception.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Drake's competence as a marine officer.
keyMoments.quote: You're not a regular chore boy, are you? Your story doesn't add up.

keyMoments.title: Drake Escorts 'Inspector' to Jonathan
keyMoments.description: Drake brings the supposed Inspector Shepherd (Usopp) to Vice Admiral Jonathan's office.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the confrontation where Usopp's deception will be exposed.

keyMoments.title: Mekao Discusses Going Merry's Condition
keyMoments.description: Mekao, the G-8 shipwright, talks to Usopp about the Going Merry's mysterious repairs and warns that the ship won't last much longer without serious maintenance.
keyMoments.significance: Foreshadows the Going Merry's eventual fate and references the mysterious Skypiea repairs.
keyMoments.quote: This ship... it's had some unusual repairs. Someone cared for it, but it won't last much longer without serious work.

relationships.description: Mekao is the father of Dr. Kobato.
